dict.acceptation: （数量等）增加；向前推（至下一步）；上涨；
增长；借款；（价格、价值的）上涨；预付款；

sent.orig: Advance, Always advance, Follow the ceaseless pace of life and advance.
sent.trans: 要前进，永远前进，跟随永不停息的生活前进。

sent.orig: If we did not advance when the masses demand advance, that would be Right opportunism.
sent.trans: 当着群众要求前进的时候，我们不前进，那是右倾机会主义。

sent.orig: Article 200 Deduction of Interest in Advance Prohibited interest shall be deducted from the principal advance.
sent.trans: 第二百条借款的利息不得预先在本金中扣除。

sent.orig: The Multi-Payment Types includes the pay in advance, partial pay in advance and payments in arrears.
sent.trans: 此外，并符合多种付款方式包括预付制、部份预付制及后付制之套用弹性等。

sent.orig: A few days as much as possible in advance booking, sleeping more in advance!
sent.trans: 尽量提前几天去订票，卧铺更要提前！
